articles.description: "I always come back to how I would feel if I was given a regifted present and I wouldn’t feel any different from getting a new one."
articles.content:
A mindfulness coach who celebrates Christmas by regifting presents to loved ones has hit back at critics who say its mean explaining that she is reducing waste and helping the planet.
Mum-of-three H… [+8377 chars]
